channel.title: 2022/03 on Ian Wootten
channel.description: Recent content in 2022/03 on Ian Wootten

item.title: With $15 in Sales, My First Digital Product is My Most Successful Ever
item.description: This weekend, I released my first ever digital product. It’s only been available for 2 days and is already my most successful product ever with a grand total of 3 sales, yielding a massive $15! I jest, but this is all totally true. In the past I’ve run a web hosting service, a TShirt company before becoming an employee and then freelance developer 10 years ago. I still have boxes of tshirts that I haven’t sold and none of my previous product ventures have made me a profit.
